law.catch_line: Agent for service of process required.
law.text: Every person licensed under this subtitle shall maintain an agent in this Commonwealth for service of process. The name, address, telephone number, and electronic mail address of the agent shall be filed with the application. The commissioner shall be notified in writing by the licensee at least five (5) days prior to any change in the status of an agent.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 805, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 98, sec. 14, effective January 1, 2010.
